name: For Official Use Only
description: Information restricted to official use only. Cannot be used with classified information.

name: Originator Controlled
description: Information that is controlled by the originator. For use only with TOP SECRET, SECRET, or CONFIDENTIAL.

name: Controlled Imagery
description: Imagery that is controlled and restricted. For use with SECRET. May require NOFORN.

name: Sources and Methods Information
description: Information related to intelligence sources and methods. For use only with TOP SECRET, SECRET, or CONFIDENTIAL. In certain cases, can be used with REL TO or RELIDO.

name: Not Releasable to Foreign Nationals
description: Information that cannot be shared with foreign nationals. May be used with TOP SECRET, SECRET, CONFIDENTIAL, or UNCLASSIFIED.

name: Caution - Proprietary Information Involved
description: Contains proprietary information and should be treated with caution. May be used with TOP SECRET, SECRET, CONFIDENTIAL, or UNCLASSIFIED

name: Authorized for Release to
description: Information that can be shared with specific authorized entities. May only be used with TOP SECRET, SECRET, CONFIDENTIAL. May be used with RELIDO. Cannot be used with NOFORN or EYES ONLY.

name: Releasable by Information Disclosure Official
description: Information that can be released by an authorized disclosure official. Applies to intelligence information only. May be used independently or with REL TO. Cannot be used with NOFORN.

name: Restricted Data
description: Information classified as restricted data. May be used only with TOP SECRET or SECRET.

name: Critical Nuclear Weapon Design Information
description: Information crucial to nuclear weapon design. May be used only with TOP SECRET or SECRET. Requires RD or FRD.

name: Sigma [#]
description: May be used only with TOP SECRET, SECRET, or CONFIDENTIAL. Requires RD or FRD. [#] represents the SIGMA number which ranges from 1 to 99.

name: Formerly Restricted Data
description: Formerly restricted data. May be used only with TOP SECRET, SECRET, or CONFIDENTIAL

name: DOD or DOE Controlled Nuclear Information
description: Information controlled by the Department of Defense or Department of Energy. May only be used with UNCLASSIFIED.

name: USA Eyes Only
description: Information restricted to U.S. personnel only. May only be used with TOP SECRET, SECRET, or CONFIDENTIAL. Cannot be used with NOFORN or REL TO. Can be used with RELIDO.

name: DEA Sensitive
description: Information sensitive to the Drug Enforcement Administration. May only be used with UNCLASSIFIED.

name: Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act
description: Information governed by the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act.
